title: jstmtlqc
author: jstmtlqc
content: Trend Surfers now offers a variety of PineScript coding services to enhance your trading strategies. Here's an overview of what we can do for you:Custom Study Script Creation: Our experienced coders can create a custom study script (indicator) that fits your unique trading requirements. From simple moving averages to complex indicators, we've got you covered.Custom Strategy Script Creation with Backtest Capability: We can design a custom strategy script that includes backtesting capabilities tailored to your trading style and goals.Indicator-to-Strategy Conversion: Turn your favorite indicator into a full-fledged trading strategy with our help. Our team can convert your existing indicator into a strategy script for more options in automated trading.Combine Multiple Indicators into One Script Code: If you use multiple indicators for trading decisions, we can consolidate them into a single script code for easier management.Add Alert Functionality to Existing Scripts: If you already have a script but need to add alert functionality, we can ensure your script alerts you when specific market conditions are met.Custom Strategies Compatible with Auto Trade Services: Our custom strategies work seamlessly with popular auto trade services like 3Commas, Cryptohopper, AutoView, and PineConnector.PineScript Code Version Updates: We can provide regular updates to your PineScript code to ensure optimal functionality.
